description: Led product strategy and delivery across 40+ client engagements for cloud-based analytics products in fintech, sports, telecom and SaaS. Defined roadmaps and partnered with engineering and business stakeholders to ship data platforms that drove measurable client outcomes. Built frameworks for data product ownership (published via Fivetran), established internal delivery standards, and mentored product team. Managed strategic partnerships with dbt Labs and Mixpanel to align product integrations with adoption goals. Technical stack: Modern data platforms (BigQuery, Snowflake, dbt, Fivetran, Looker).

description: Scaled agile product delivery across three digital marketing teams in eCommerce. Partnered with cross-functional stakeholders to define roadmaps and prioritize enhancements that tied to business improvements. Led Black Friday analytics initiatives, allowing for a reporting tools that optimized real-time campaign performance.

Defined product strategy and roadmap for a real estate SaaS platform serving millions of NYC home seekers. Shipped consumer-facing features (Saved Searches, CMS, publishing tools) by partnering with engineering, design, and sales. Ran A/B testing initiatives to drive engagement and retention. Built reporting systems that gave executive teams real-time operational insights.

Led interior design for a rental property management startup. Created furniture systems and worked with clients to optimize their spaces for Airbnb guestsâ€”early lessons in designing for user experience and operational constraints.

Built and managed databases of NYC luxury residential properties. Created 3D architectural visualizations for marketing and editorial content, including renderings featured in ArchDaily's NYC skyline coverage.
Designed 3D environments for residential and commercial clients across Montreal and NYC. Projects included venue recreations for event planning and a new rock climbing gym design.
